Package.Description: Choose this package if you do not have Microsoft Visual C installed on your Windows computer. If the GEM-Selektor fails to start with an error message that "vcruntime140.dll" is missing then run one of the files (e.g. "vc_redist.x64.exe") in "\GEMS396\MSVC_redist\" folder, then try starting the GEM-Selektor again from the Windows start menu.
